directions: Place almond milk, hemp seeds, chia seeds, almond butter, cocoa powder, instant coffee, and agave nectar in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a small saucepan and heat, stirring frequently, over medium-low heat until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes. Pour into a mug.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon agave nectar, or to taste
title: Hot Protein-Packed Mocha Smoothie
